title: Lunchbox Apologizes To Carrie Underwood + Lauren Alaina Stops By For Friday Morning Conversation
itunes:title: Lunchbox Apologizes To Carrie Underwood + Lauren Alaina Stops By For Friday Morning Conversation
description:
Lunchbox makes an apology for a comment he made about Carrie Underwood. Also, Lauren Alaina stops by for the Friday Morning Conversation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
